index_texts:
Replace your notebooks and printed documents with the only tablet that feels like paper.Buy nowWatch videoreMarkable at a glanceTake handwritten notes, read, and review documentsA display that looks and feels like paperConvert your handwritten notes into textTake notes directly on PDFsEye-friendly readingAll your notes, organized and accessible on all devicesMashable Choice is a badge of honor, reserved for the absolute best stuff you can see, use, or do. If it’s Choice, it’s worth your time."One of the coolest writing devices it has ever been my pleasure to use."Read reviewUp toTwo weeks of battery without rechargingEstimated battery life improvementUp toThe world’s most responsive digital paperSpeed at which digital ink appears on reMarkableThe world's thinnest tablet. 30% thinner than reMarkable 1.The brand new Marker Plus comes with a second eraser-sensor in its top endThe Marker and new Book Folio snap to reMarkable magneticallyFor fast file transfer and chargingTemplatesResize and moveBrushesUndoEraseCopy and pasteLayersreMarkable bridges the gap between pen and paper, and your digital devices. Easily access your notes from your laptop or phone, where they're always readily available to review and reuse.
In a distracted world, reMarkable 2 was designed to not get in your brain’s way. Free from distractions, you can find the focus you need to think better. No notifications, social media, or email — just you and your thoughts.A paper-like surfaceIncredible responsivenessMinimal pen-to-ink distanceCrisp black inkreMarkable 2 looks and feels like paper. A combination of cutting edge digital paper technology and ultra-thin high-friction surface materials, allows the second-generation CANVAS display to deliver an unprecedented paper experience. Discover how you can create the perfect folder structure, become a better note-taker, and master reMarkable’s powerful digital tools.At just 0.19 inches / 4.7 mm, reMarkable is the world’s thinnest tablet. This is essential to providing a more paper-like writing experience.Thinner is better for writingPaper-thin design for comfortable handwriting.Thinner is better for your bagReplace your notebooks with a device thinner than your smartphone.Created with function and style in mind, all Folios are made from fine materials and designed to fit your reMarkable 2 perfectly.The original sleeve for reMarkable 2. In minimalist polymer weave.Keep your reMarkable in its cover while working. Designed in conjunction with reMarkable 2, Book Folio is smart and functional protection for your paper tablet.34 secBuilt-in magnets mean you can simply snap your reMarkable in placeBook Folio is available in a fine leather finish that ages beautifullyMarkerMarker Plus with built-in eraserNo charging or setup requiredAttaches to reMarkable magneticallyTilt and pressure sensitiveMarker Plus is an unrivalled digital writing instrument. A second sensor on the Marker Plus’ top end, allows you to erase by simply flipping it upside down like a traditional pencil.NoYesGrayBlack15 g19 gYesYesAt reMarkable, we create paperless, organized, and focused workplaces. Make reMarkable 2 part of your business for better meetings, uncluttered desks, and improved workflow.Learn more about reMarkable for business187 x 246 x 4.7 mm
Approximately 403.5 g (.88 lb)1 GB LPDDR3 SDRAM
8 GB internal storage10.3” monochrome digital paper display (no colors)
1872 x 1404 resolution (226 DPI)
Partially powered by E Ink Carta technology
Multi-point capacitive touchNo charging, setup, or pairing required
Special high-friction pen tip
Tilt detection
4096 levels of pressure sensitivityWi-Fi 2.4GHz and 5GHz
USB-C
Accessory portRechargeable (Li-ion) battery 
USB-C charging
3000 mAhCodex — A purposely designed Linux-based operating 
system for low-latency digital paper displaysMenu language: English only
Note and file syncing between reMarkable tablet and reMarkable apps for MacOS, Windows 10, iOS, and Android
